issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
- Data are not refreshing from API for some views, at the same time it is working for other views 
- Push notifications are not working
fields.summary: Android App Not working properly after android update Oreo 8

comments.body: Hello, We need a standalone app.js file for testing the issue that you are having with Android 8. Please provide a sample reproducible code. Thanks.
Hello [~ppancholi], Was your app built with an old version of Titanium SDK? Let us know the version. Our latest SDK 7.3.0.GA has full Android 8 support. Thanks.
